vsParam:
Huh? [px] Senpai.
I received a letter addressed to you.

Huh? From whom? Open it.
... Huh!?

Wh-why are you so surprised!?
Who wrote it?

May I see what it says!?
Hmm. It says...

"To dear [px].
Looks like you haven't lost hope in alchemy."

"To be honest, I'm very angry about it.
I thought you could surely understand how I feel."

"So I want to talk to you directly.
You'll find a map in this letter. I hope you can come."

I never expected him to send a letter here like this...
What's your plan, [px]...

I don't think it's a good idea to go there.
It might be a trap.

But... Calendula is in this place, right?
So, if we could convince him...

I don't think that guy can be convinced...
But compared with doing nothing...

Something bad happened!
Lots of monsters showed up near the Academy!

Those monsters make us feel...
Calendula is behind them again.

What did you say!? Darn it, Calendula...
You don't even want to give us a chance to choose...

If [px] doesn't go meet him, he'll keep releasing
monsters until the Academy is destroyed...!

That seems to be his plan. Because there are a lot more
monsters this time than earlier.

Huh!? We must hurry up and help kill the monsters!
B-but we need to meet Calendula as well...!

Ha ha ha ha ha! Don't worry!
We're here to help!

E-Erika!? And Varerian!
And even M-Mantle!?

Hehe. We rushed here upon hearing about the Academy's
crisis. Mr. Fever is doing his best to bring medical supplies here!

I heard of it from my father.
Heehee. I think it's a good chance to repay your favor!

I'm also here to help little [px]!
It's hard to sit by and let such a kawaii child suffer!

So, we'll help destroy the monsters.
[px] and you guys just go do what you need to do.

We'll stay here to defend the Academy!
You guys go beat the heck out of Calendula!

Yeah! Everyone in this big family will stay here
to guard the Academy!

Uh. Well said... Yeah. Everyone, show those monsters
what we people in the Academy are capable of!
Ha ha ha. Everyone in the Academy...!

It's settled then. You guys go look for Calendula,
and we'll stay here to defend the Academy.

Yeah! I'll do my best!
I won't let anyone get hurt!

Heehee. I'm so eager to fight.
I should buckle down once in a while...!

Ha ha ha. It's time to show the mechanical power!
Are you ready, Popy?

Uh... I-I'm not very good at fighting...
You're not asking me to... explode myself, are you...?

...[px].
Don't forget what I said to you earlier.

You have many partners to rely upon.
Just look around you.

There are so many people helping you.
And it all comes from the "Affinity" you've created.

Yeah. That's right, [px].
This is actually the source of your power.

I allowed Calendula to go down the wrong path.
This is undoubtedly my fault.

I feel so sorry that you guys
have to clean up my mess...

...[px].
I leave this job to you.

Good!
So everyone, are you ready?

Yeah. No problem!
... To be honest, I'm a bit nervous.

There's a chance that you'll need to fight too,
so, you better make thorough preparations...

... Yeah. But don't worry.
We have [px]!

That's right!
So everyone... Let's go!!

Senpais, good luck!
Let's say it together!!
